extendedInfo.description: Donut Games' WORLD FAMOUS RAT hits the Android! Kick-start the scooter and head down to the abandoned suburbs to BURN SOME SERIOUS RUBBER.Perform dangerous STUNTS and jumps on top of the scaffolds in Ratty's boldest adventure ever.- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -GAME FEATURES:- FOUR game modes- 1: "Super Cheese XL"- 2: "Fuel Depot"- 3: "Skill Course"- 4: "Power Rider" with SPECIAL POWER-UPS- Perform STUNTS and receive bonus points- Rock solid controls- New "mid-air" jumps- Achievements to unlock- Donut Games' Collectors Icon #17- And much more...- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -Enjoy another Donut Games release!

reviews.title: Great Game, but Ads Cause Lag and Block Screen
reviews.comment: This game is amazing, and great for passing time, but the free version ads are on the game screen until you die, which is usually soon because of how fat the ads are. They also lag the game, and cause you to jump after a platform is gone and such. If they could slim down the ads a bit, and shorten the time they\'re displayed, I would rate this game 5 stars, but alas, that\'s not the case right now, so they\'re getting a 2.
reviews.author: Simone Sprinkles-Abadeer

reviews.title: Great game, annoying ads
reviews.comment: This is an addictive and well-made game. The only annoyance is the ads displayed in-game, with a 69p/99c cost to remove. I like games to be honest and offer a paid app version, or else keep the ads to the title screen.
reviews.author: Gavin Clayton

reviews.title: Exellent
reviews.comment: Thus game is amazing its so much fun to play and the levels are soooo easy thjs game rox
reviews.author: rajvi javeri

reviews.title: Freezes & slows down with ads!
reviews.comment: Ads slow down the whole game and freezes the screen ! When I try to reopen the game it takes forever and ends up freezing on a black screen.
reviews.author: aribel medina

reviews.title: Good game, ads ruin it
reviews.comment: Move ads to title screen or display a full screen one on every death. Currently they block the view of the platforms which basically makes the game pointless.
reviews.author: William Dutton

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Even better on android but please add Google play games support!
reviews.author: Jens Br\303\266cher

reviews.title: Lag King
reviews.comment: This game is lagging on a 1.2 quad core,  1 GB ram phone to an unplayable level. Where every other game on earth (2d n 3d) works butter smooth. Yea even the ones ported from iOS. I paid to remove remove ads in hopes of better performance but I was wrong. This is the game I have been waiting for a lifetime to get ported to android.  Not even a single update to optimize the game yet.
reviews.author: Furqan Dogar

reviews.title: Ads
reviews.comment: The ads are extremely annoying, please make them appear only in the menus or make an ad-free version that I will let myself sideload, because devs who let money-generating ads control the game aren\'t worth earning a buck of my money.
reviews.author: Daniel Sharon

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Works very well and very addictive though in my mobile i have to touch below the play again option in order for it to play again.Annoying ads.Also many other donut games are not present for android.
reviews.author: Aman Parasramka

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I have seen this game on apple phones about an year ago nd now m very happy to see this game on play store.. its great game but ads is also a big problem pls thought about it
reviews.author: Rajat Sharma

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Nice port to Android. Ad placement is inconvenient at times. P.S please bring Rat on a Skateboard to Android next!!! :D
reviews.author: Leslie Lay

reviews.title: Good gamr
reviews.comment: Very addictive game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: The menu screen to select what you want to do is jumpy writing underneath cannot see what i\'m selecting uninstalling sorry
reviews.author: Josey Hardy

reviews.title: Terrible ads
reviews.comment: The ads are just too much. Honestly most of the time I die because I can\'t see the platforms. Would give at least 4 stars but the ads give it a 2
reviews.author: John Mason

reviews.title: Really fun
reviews.comment: This is a game you will easily become addicted to.

reviews.title: love this
reviews.comment: I\'ve always loved this game. It\'s addictive and really great to play when you need to pass time

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Good not so bad

reviews.title: Rat on a scooter
reviews.comment: It is good fun but i think it could be more like rat on a skateboard

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This is the best game ever who cares about the ads

reviews.title: I love this game
